search_results.title: Baizhang Huaihai
search_results.snippet: Baizhang Huaihai (720–814) was a Zen master during the Tang dynasty. A native of Fuzhou, he was a dharma heir of Mazu Daoyi (Wade-Giles: Ma-tsu Tao-i).

search_results.title: Baizhang Huaihai - Buddha-Nature - Tsadra Foundation
search_results.snippet: A native of Fuzhou, he was a dharma heir of Mazu Daoyi (Wade-Giles: Ma-tsu Tao-i).[1] Baizhang's students included Huangbo, Linji and Puhua. Hagiographic ...
